meanings.definition: In a domineering or arrogant manner
meanings.sent1: He spoke highhandedly, demanding everyone follow his orders without question.
meanings.sent2: She highhandedly dismissed all suggestions that didn't align with her own beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The cat acted highhandedly, refusing to share its toy with the other pets.
meanings.sent4: The storm approached highhandedly, unleashing its fury without warning.
meanings.sent5: The dictator ruled highhandedly, crushing any opposition with an iron fist.

meanings.definition: Without consulting others or considering their opinions
meanings.sent1: The manager made decisions highhandedly, ignoring the input of his team.
meanings.sent2: She highhandedly implemented changes without seeking feedback from her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The robot vacuum cleaner highhandedly decided to clean the same spot repeatedly, much to the amusement of the family.
meanings.sent4: Time highhandedly marches on, oblivious to our desires to pause or rewind.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed highhandedly, carving its path through the rugged terrain.
